data.title: Salim Langde Pe Mat Ro
data.meta_description: Salim Langde Pe Mat Ro (English Don't Cry over the lame Salim's Death) is a 1989 Indian film directed by Saeed Akhtar Mirza, with Pavan Malhotra as lead. The film won the 37th National Film Award for Best Feature Film in Hindi in 1989 and 1990 National Film Award for Best Cinematography. The film i
